definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

sentences.english: Across the industry, occupancy rates have dropped about 10 percent Carew said.
sentences.chinese: 整個行業，住房率已下降10%左右，卡魯說。

sentences.english: The first group of affordable public housing tenants in Shenyang moved into their new homes yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽市保障性住房第一批住戶昨天喜遷新居。

sentences.english: Consider housing starts, which have fallen to their lowest level in 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到住房建設開工已經降到50年來的最低水平。

sentences.english: First, the coverage of low-rent housing security should be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 一是擴大廉租住房制度的保障範圍。

sentences.english: Indemnificatory housing difficultly on difficultly in sources of fund.
sentences.chinese: 保障性住房難就難在資金來源。

sentences.english: In Shansi province two storey and one and a half storey houses are typical.
sentences.chinese: 在山西省，典型的住房是兩層和一層半。

sentences.english: The implications of some technical options for decarbonizing the UK domestic sector are explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了使英國住房脫碳的技術選擇。

sentences.english: Housing provident fund in the development of our region, some problems still exist.
sentences.chinese: 我區的住房公積金在發展中仍然存在着一些問題。

sentences.english: In this instance, interest-only home equity loans are beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，只付利息的住房抵押貸款都是有益的。

sentences.english: A drastic reformation of the present housing system has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前的住房制度正在徹底改革。

sentences.english: Donnison's influential cross-cultural study of housing policy.
sentences.chinese: 唐尼森對多種文化地域住房政策所作的有影響的研究。

sentences.english: In cities, modules can be stacked to make a new generation of efficient buildings.
sentences.chinese: 城市裏，模型房能建造成片形成新一代的有效住房。

sentences.english: We strengthened regulation and oversight of thereal estatemarket to improve the mix of market housing available.
sentences.chinese: 加強房地產市場調控和監管，着力調整住房供給結構。

sentences.english: The data were collected in the housing property Bureau of Wuhan by questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 數據集來源於武漢房產局的住房調查數據。

sentences.english: American lawmakers and law enforcers are busy with the housing finance market.
sentences.chinese: 美國立法機構和司法機構正忙於住房金融市場。

sentences.english: Spain's law on "self-supply" involves energy-saving housing.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的“自主供應”法令有涉及住房節能問題。
